ALIAS COMMAND                    DISPLAY NAME
bkh   help                       Botkube Help
g     gh verb -V                 GH verb
h     helm                       
hv    helm version               Helm ver
k     kubectl                    k alias
kb    kubectl -n botkube         kubectl for botkube ns
kc    kubectl                    
kcn   kubectl -n ns              
kgp   kubectl get pods           
kk    kubectl                    
kv    kubectl version --filter=3 version with filter
p     ping                       Botkube Ping
